I‚Äôm very satisfied with the service at this clinic. I went for tooth extraction, scaling, and polishing, and the whole experience was very pleasant. There was minimal pain and discomfort and the atmosphere was not at all traumatic.

The dentist here is extremely patient and meticulous with every procedure. He ensured I was comfortable, explained each step clearly, and made me feel confident throughout the treatment. The assistant was also very kind and helpful, making sure I felt well taken care of during the session.

Additionally, the pricing is very reasonable for the quality of service provided. I was even able to eat normally just a few hours after the procedure, which was a big relief. I‚Äôll definitely return for my next routine appointment. Highly recommended for anyone looking for a comfortable, professional, and affordable dental experience.
